de.fuberlin.panda.metadata

Class MetadataConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fuberlin.panda.metadata.MetadataConnector

  • public class MetadataConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    The MetadataConnector is the main entrance to the metadata fusion. It's the API which calls the constructor MetadataConnector(MetadataSourceType, List, boolean) and the method getMetadata() to retrieve the metadata information of the given URIs.
    Since:
    05.09.2013
    Author:
    Sebastian Schulz
    See Also:
    MetadataConnector(MetadataSourceType, List, boolean), getMetadata()

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetadataConnector(MetadataSourceType sourceType, java.util.List<java.lang.String> uris, boolean fusion)
      The constructor just adds the given information to protected fields and calls the RDFInput.initPredicates() to initialize the matching possibility for later processing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetadataConnector

        public MetadataConnector(MetadataSourceType sourceType,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> uris,
                 boolean fusion)
        The constructor just adds the given information to protected fields and calls the RDFInput.initPredicates() to initialize the matching possibility for later processing.
        Parameters:
        sourceType - - a MetadataSourceType which represents the source the metadata should be parsed from.
        uris - - a List of URIs which should be processed.
        fusion - - a boolean value which describes whether a fusion should be done or not.

    • Method Detail

      • createInitialLoggingOutput

        private void createInitialLoggingOutput(MetadataSourceType sourceType,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> uris,
                              boolean fusion)
        This method creates a logging info which represents the key attributes given by the parameters.
        Parameters:
        sourceType - - a MetadataSourceType which represents the source the metadata should be parsed from.
        uris - - a List of URIs which should be processed.
        fusion - - a boolean value which describes whether a fusion should be done or not.

      • initProperties

        private void initProperties()
        This method is responsible for loading the initial configuration before the processing begins.

      • getMetadata

        public java.lang.String getMetadata()
                             throws MetadataNotFoundException,
                                    ProcessingUriException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        This method is the main control loop of the program. At the beginning it decides if a fusion should be done or not. Afterwards for every URI the metadata information is parsed from the source regarding the sourceType. Finally the metadata model is created and the RDF/XML representation is returned a s String value.
        Returns:
        a String value which represents the RDF/XML output of the metada model.
        Throws:
        MetadataNotFoundException - - in case an URI has no metadata which could be parsed from the source.
        ProcessingUriException - - in case the metadata couldn't be parsed from the source.
        java.io.IOException - - in case something went wrong with the output stream.
